I am currently responsible for software support/maintenance and devel-
opmentonnewproductsaswell, onbothfrontendandbackendside. Stack
included Google Cloud Platform, Docker, Kubernetes and NodeJS.

ican student loan management system. Stack included ASP.NET, Entity
Framework, Microsoft SQL Server and HTML/CSS/JS.

Our team was doing SharePoint customizations for projects related to
a few Singapore’s governmental institutions. Stack included Microsoft
SharePoint, Microsoft SQL Server and HTML/CSS/JS.
Aug 2015 - Mar 2016, Intern, École des Mines de Paris - France
I was doing some cache proﬁling for further memory optimizations under
the guidance of my supervisor. Stack used: C, Lex & Yacc, Valgrind.
